attributes.action: Give tax refunds to all NHS staff & Carers working during the COVID19 crisis.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to acknowledge the astounding work that is being carried out by NHS staff and Carers in this crisis. A tax refund for the full period of the COVID 19 crisis, will show the Government and Publics appreciation of the amazing selfless commitment NHS staff and Carers are demonstrating. The tax refund would enable these vital staff the chance to take a well earned rest to recover from the physical and mental turmoil they are currently living through in order to save our lives
attributes.background: NHS staff and Carers all over the UK from Cleaners to Consultants are putting their lives at risk during the COVID19 crisis. They are exposed to potentially deadly bodily fluids, often without full protective equipment. They are risking their lives to save ours, and deserve a  financial reward.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
